trans-unit.source: All prefixes must be within link-local address space (169.254.0.0/16) and must be /29 or shorter (/28, /27, etc). Google will attempt to select an unused /29 from the supplied candidate prefix(es). The request will fail if all possible /29s are in use on Google's edge. If not supplied, Google will randomly select an unused /29 from all of link-local space.
trans-unit.target: 所有的前缀必须在链接本地地址空间(169.254.0.0/16)内,并且必须是/29或更短(/28、/27等)。Google将尝试从提供的候选前缀中选择一个未使用的/29。如果所有可能的/29都在Google的边缘使用,那么这个请求将失败。如果没有提供,Google将从所有的链接本地空间中随机选择一个未使用的/29。

trans-unit.source: All tasks in a block inherit directives applied at the block level. Most of what you can apply to a single task (with the exception of loops) can be applied at the block level, so blocks make it much easier to set data or directives common to the tasks. The directive does not affect the block itself, it is only inherited by the tasks enclosed by a block. For example, a when statement is applied to the tasks within a block, not to the block itself.
trans-unit.target: 块中的所有任务都继承在块级别应用的指令。您可以应用于单个任务的大多数内容（循环除外）都可以在块级应用，因此块使设置任务通用的数据或指令变得更加容易。该指令不影响块本身，它仅由块所包含的任务继承。例如，将 when 语句应用于块内的任务，而不是块本身。

trans-unit.source: All templating happens on the Ansible controller before the task is sent and executed on the target machine. This approach minimizes the package requirements on the target (jinja2 is only required on the controller). It also limits the amount of data Ansible passes to the target machine. Ansible parses templates on the controller and passes only the information needed for each task to the target machine, instead of passing all the data on the controller and parsing it on the target.
trans-unit.target: 在目标计算机上发送和执行任务之前，所有模板都在Ansible控制器上进行。这种方法最大程度地减少了对目标的封装要求（仅在控制器上需要jinja2）。它还限制了Ansible传递给目标计算机的数据量。Ansible解析控制器上的模板，仅将每个任务所需的信息传递给目标计算机，而不是传递控制器上的所有数据并在目标上进行解析。

trans-unit.source: All the switch nodes contain a complete copy of the concrete model. When an administrator creates a policy in the APIC that represents a configuration, the APIC updates the logical model. The APIC then performs the intermediate step of creating a fully elaborated policy that it pushes into all the switch nodes where the concrete model is updated.
trans-unit.target: 所有的交换机节点都包含一个完整的具体模型副本。当管理员在APIC中创建一个表示配置的策略时,APIC会更新逻辑模型。然后,APIC执行中间步骤,即创建一个完整的策略,并将其推送到所有更新了具体模型的交换机节点中。

trans-unit.source: Although Ansible contains a number of plugins that can convert XML to Ansible native data structures, the``cli_parse`` module runs the command on devices that return XML and returns the converted data in a single task.

trans-unit.source: Although it executes using the Ansible Python interpreter, the pip module shells out to run the actual pip command, so it can use any pip version you specify with executable. By default, it uses the pip version for the Ansible Python interpreter. For example, pip3 on python 3, and pip2 or pip on python 2.
trans-unit.target: 尽管它使用Ansible Python解释器执行，但pip模块仍然可以运行实际的pip命令，因此它可以使用您指定的任何pip版本，并带有execute。默认情况下，它对Ansible Python解释器使用pip版本。例如，在python 3上为pip3，在python 2上为pip2或pip。

trans-unit.source: Although privilege escalation is mostly intuitive, there are a few limitations on how it works. Users should be aware of these to avoid surprises.
trans-unit.target: 虽然权限升级大多是直观的,但它的工作方式有一些限制。用户应该意识到这些,以避免出现意外。

trans-unit.source: Although source IP isn’t required on the command line it is required when using this module. The PKL VRF must also be configured prior to using this module.
trans-unit.target: 尽管在命令行上不需要源IP，但是在使用此模块时是必需的。使用此模块之前，还必须先配置PKL VRF。

trans-unit.source: Although the JSON specification allows unordered elements, the APIC REST API requires that the JSON attributes element precede the children array or other elements. So you need to ensure that your payload conforms to this requirement. Sorting your dictionary keys will do the trick just fine. If you don’t have any attributes, it may be necessary to add: attributes: {} as the APIC does expect the entry to precede any children.
trans-unit.target: 虽然JSON规范允许无序元件时，APIC REST API要求JSON attributes 元件先于 children 阵列或其它元件。因此，您需要确保您的有效负载符合此要求。排序字典键可以解决问题。如果你没有任何属性，可能有必要增加： attributes: {} 作为APIC确实希望进入先于任何 children 。

trans-unit.source: Although the Solaris ZFS filesystem has filesystem ACLs, the ACLs are not POSIX.1e filesystem acls (they are NFSv4 ACLs instead). Ansible cannot use these ACLs to manage its temp file permissions so you may have to resort to allow_world_readable_tmpfiles if the remote machines use ZFS.
trans-unit.target: 尽管Solaris ZFS文件系统具有文件系统ACL，但这些ACL并非POSIX.1e文件系统ACL（它们是NFSv4 ACL）。Ansible无法使用这些ACL来管理其临时文件权限，因此，如果远程计算机使用ZFS，则可能不得不诉诸 allow_world_readable_tmpfiles 。

trans-unit.source: Although the defaults are chosen so that the module can be used with the Let’s Encrypt CA, the module can in principle be used with any CA providing an ACME endpoint, such as Buypass Go SSL.
trans-unit.target: 尽管选择了默认值，以便该模块可以与Let's Encrypt CA一起使用，但是该模块原则上可以与任何提供ACME端点的CA一起使用，例如Buypass Go SSL。

trans-unit.source: Although these tasks are not needed to write data to disk, they are used in this example to demonstrate some methods of accessing facts about the given devices or a named host.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这些任务不需要将数据写入磁盘,但在这个例子中,它们被用来演示访问有关给定设备或命名主机的事实的一些方法。

trans-unit.source: Although this module can manage DRS, HA and VSAN related configurations, this functionality is deprecated and will be removed in 2.12.
trans-unit.target: 虽然该模块可以管理DRS、HA和VSAN相关配置,但该功能已被废弃,并将在2.12中删除。

trans-unit.source: Although this module is idempotent in that if the ace as presented in the task is identical to the one on the switch, no changes will be made. If there is any difference, what is in Ansible will be pushed (configured options will be overridden). This is to improve security, but at the same time remember an ACE is removed, then re-added, so if there is a change, the new ACE will be exactly what parameters you are sending to the module.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这个模块是幂等的,如果任务中呈现的王牌与交换机上的王牌相同,则不会做出任何改变。如果有任何不同,Ansible中的东西将被推送(配置的选项将被覆盖)。这是为了提高安全性,但同时要记住一个ACE是被删除后再重新添加的,所以如果有变化,新的ACE将完全是你发送给模块的参数。

trans-unit.source: Although you can store variables in the main inventory file, storing separate host and group variables files may help you organize your variable values more easily. Host and group variable files must use YAML syntax. Valid file extensions include ‘.yml’, ‘.yaml’, ‘.json’, or no file extension. See YAML Syntax if you are new to YAML.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以将变量存储在主清单文件中，但是存储单独的主机变量和组变量文件可以帮助您更轻松地组织变量值。主机和组变量文件必须使用YAML语法。有效的文件扩展名包括“ .yml”，“。yaml”，“。json”或没有文件扩展名。如果您不熟悉YAML，请参见YAML语法。

trans-unit.source: An Ansible ad-hoc command uses the /usr/bin/ansible command-line tool to automate a single task on one or more managed nodes. Ad-hoc commands are quick and easy, but they are not re-usable. So why learn about ad-hoc commands first? Ad-hoc commands demonstrate the simplicity and power of Ansible. The concepts you learn here will port over directly to the playbook language. Before reading and executing these examples, please read How to build your inventory.
trans-unit.target: Ansible ad-hoc命令使用 /usr/bin/ansible 命令行工具来自动化一个或多个受管节点上的单个任务。临时命令既快速又简单，但不可重复使用。那么，为什么要先了解即席命令呢？临时命令展示了Ansible的简单性和强大功能。您在此处学习的概念将直接移植到剧本语言。在阅读和执行这些示例之前，请阅读如何构建库存。

trans-unit.source: An alias for a key. For safety, even though KMS does not require keys to have an alias, this module expects all new keys to be given an alias to make them easier to manage. Existing keys without an alias may be referred to by key_id. Use aws_kms_info to find key ids. Required if key_id is not given. Note that passing a key_id and alias will only cause a new alias to be added, an alias will never be renamed. The 'alias/' prefix is optional.
trans-unit.target: 密钥的别名。为了安全起见，即使KMS不需要密钥具有别名，此模块也希望所有新密钥都具有别名，以便于管理。不带别名的现有密钥可以由key_id引用。使用aws_kms_info查找密钥ID。如果未提供key_id，则为必需。请注意，传递key_id和别名只会导致添加新的别名，永远不会重命名别名。'alias /'前缀是可选的。

trans-unit.source: An alias for a key. For safety, even though KMS does not require keys to have an alias, this module expects all new keys to be given an alias to make them easier to manage. Existing keys without an alias may be referred to by key_id. Use community.aws.aws_kms_info to find key ids. Required if key_id is not given. Note that passing a key_id and alias will only cause a new alias to be added, an alias will never be renamed. The 'alias/' prefix is optional.
trans-unit.target: 密钥的别名。为了安全起见，即使KMS不需要密钥具有别名，此模块也希望为所有新密钥赋予别名，以使其更易于管理。不带别名的现有密钥可以由key_id引用。使用community.aws.aws_kms_info查找密钥ID。如果未提供key_id，则为必需。请注意，传递key_id和别名只会导致添加新的别名，永远不会重命名别名。'alias /'前缀是可选的。

trans-unit.source: An alternative to using vpn_connection_id. If multiple matches are found, vpn_connection_id is required. If one of the following suboptions is a list of items to filter by, only one item needs to match to find the VPN that correlates. e.g. if the filter cidr is ['194.168.2.0/24', '192.168.2.0/24'] and the VPN route only has the destination cidr block of 192.168.2.0/24 it will be found with this filter (assuming there are not multiple VPNs that are matched). Another example, if the filter vpn is equal to ['vpn-ccf7e7ad', 'vpn-cb0ae2a2'] and one of of the VPNs has the state deleted (exists but is unmodifiable) and the other exists and is not deleted, it will be found via this filter. See examples.
trans-unit.target: 替代使用vpn_connection_id的方法。如果找到多个匹配项，则需要vpn_connection_id。如果以下子选项之一是要过滤的项目列表，则只有一个项目需要匹配才能找到相关的VPN。例如，如果过滤器cidr为 ['194.168.2.0/24', '192.168.2.0/24'] ，并且VPN路由的目标cidr块为 192.168.2.0/24 ，则可以使用此过滤器找到（假设有没有多个匹配的VPN）。另一个示例，如果过滤器vpn等于 ['vpn-ccf7e7ad', 'vpn-cb0ae2a2'] 并且其中一个VPN的状态为已删除（存在但无法修改），而另一个VPN的存在状态未被删除，则可以通过此过滤器找到它。参见示例。

trans-unit.source: An alternative to using vpn_connection_id. If multiple matches are found, vpn_connection_id is required. If one of the following suboptions is a list of items to filter by, only one item needs to match to find the VPN that correlates. e.g. if the filter 'cidr' is ['194.168.2.0/24', '192.168.2.0/24'] and the VPN route only has the destination cidr block of '192.168.2.0/24' it will be found with this filter (assuming there are not multiple VPNs that are matched). Another example, if the filter 'vpn' is equal to ['vpn-ccf7e7ad', 'vpn-cb0ae2a2'] and one of of the VPNs has the state deleted (exists but is unmodifiable) and the other exists and is not deleted, it will be found via this filter. See examples.
trans-unit.target: 一个替代使用vpn_connection_id的方法。如果找到多个匹配项,则需要使用vpn_connection_id。例如,如果过滤器'cidr'是['194.168.2.0/24','192.168.2.0/24'],而VPN路由的目标cidr块只有'192.168.2.0/24',那么就可以通过这个过滤器找到(假设没有多个VPN被匹配)。又如,如果过滤器'vpn'等于['vpn-ccf7e7ad','vpn-cb0ae2a2'],且其中一个VPN的状态为删除(存在但不可修改),另一个存在且未删除,则会通过此过滤器找到。请看例子。

trans-unit.source: Another important thing to consider (for all versions) is that connection variables override config, command line and play/role/task specific options and keywords. See Controlling how Ansible behaves: precedence rules for more details. For example, if your inventory specifies ansible_user: ramon and you run:
trans-unit.target: （对于所有版本）要考虑的另一重要事项是，连接变量会覆盖config，命令行以及播放/角色/任务特定的选项和关键字。有关更多详细信息，请参见控制Ansible的行为方式：优先级规则。例如，如果您的清单指定 ansible_user: ramon 并运行：

trans-unit.source: Another major use of variables is running a command and registering the result of that command as a variable. When you execute a task and save the return value in a variable for use in later tasks, you create a registered variable. There are more examples of this in the Conditionals chapter.
trans-unit.target: 变量的另一个主要用途是运行命令并将该命令的结果注册为变量。执行任务并将返回值保存在变量中以供以后的任务使用时，将创建一个注册变量。在条件章节中有更多示例。

trans-unit.source: Another new setting is admin_users which allows you to specify a list of users to be considered ‘administrators’. Previously this was hardcoded to root. It now it defaults to [root, toor, admin]. This information is used when choosing between your remote_temp and system_temps directory.
trans-unit.target: 另一个新设置是 admin_users ，它允许您指定要被视为“管理员”的用户列表。以前，这是硬编码到 root 的。现在，它默认为 [root, toor, admin] 。在 remote_temp 和 system_temps 目录之间进行选择时，将使用此信息。

trans-unit.source: Another option frequently used, is to tie the local connection method to this target so that every subsequent task for this target will use the local connection method (hence run it locally, rather than use SSH).
trans-unit.target: 经常使用的另一个选项是将 local 连接方法绑定到该目标，以便该目标的每个后续任务都将使用本地连接方法（因此在本地运行它，而不是使用SSH）。

trans-unit.source: Another special tag is never, which will prevent a task from running unless a tag is specifically requested.
trans-unit.target: 另一个特殊标签 never ，除非有特殊要求，否则它将阻止任务运行。

trans-unit.source: Another way is to avoid adding elements to the list in the first place, so you can just use it directly:
trans-unit.target: 另一种方法是先避免在列表中添加元素,所以可以直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Another way to add private key files without using ssh-agent is using ansible_ssh_private_key_file in an inventory file as explained here: How to build your inventory.
trans-unit.target: 在不使用ssh-agent的情况下添加私钥文件的另一种方法是在清单文件中使用 ansible_ssh_private_key_file ，如此处所述：如何构建清单。

trans-unit.source: Another way to pass arguments to a module is using YAML syntax also called ‘complex args’
trans-unit.target: 将参数传递给模块的另一种方法是使用YAML语法，也称为“复杂参数”

trans-unit.source: Another way to pass arguments to a module is using YAML syntax, also called ‘complex args’
trans-unit.target: Another way to pass arguments to a module is using YAML syntax, also called ‘complex args’

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.0 has deprecated the “ssh” from ansible_ssh_user, ansible_ssh_pass, ansible_ssh_host, and ansible_ssh_port to become ansible_user, ansible_password, ansible_host, and ansible_port. If using a version of Ansible prior to 2.0, the older style (ansible_ssh_*) should be used instead. The shorter variables are ignored, without warning, in older versions of Ansible.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.0从 ansible_ssh_user ， ansible_ssh_pass ， ansible_ssh_host 和 ansible_ssh_port 弃用了“ ssh” ，使其成为 ansible_user ， ansible_password ， ansible_host 和 ansible_port 。如果使用2.0之前的Ansible版本，则应改用较旧的样式（ ansible_ssh_* ）。在旧版本的Ansible中，较短的变量将被忽略，而不会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.5 added the become_flags parameter to the runas become method. This parameter can be set using the become_flags task directive or set in Ansible’s configuration using ansible_become_flags. The two valid values that are initially supported for this parameter are logon_type and logon_flags.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.5将 become_flags 参数添加到了 runas 方法中。此参数可以使用设置 become_flags 使用Ansible的配置任务指令或集 ansible_become_flags 。最初为此参数支持的两个有效值是 logon_type 和 logon_flags 。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.5 adds the ability for a site administrator to blacklist modules that they do not want to be available to Ansible. This is configured via a yaml configuration file (by default, /etc/ansible/plugin_filters.yml). Use plugin_filters_cfg configuration in defaults section to change this configuration file path. trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.5 introduces two top-level persistent connection types, network_cli and netconf. With connection: local, each task passed the connection parameters, which had to be stored in your playbooks. With network_cli and netconf the playbook passes the connection parameters once, so you can pass them at the command line if you prefer. We recommend you use network_cli and netconf whenever possible. Note that eAPI and NX-API still require local connections with provider dictionaries. See the platform documentation for more information. Unless you need a local connection, update your playbooks to use network_cli or netconf and to specify your connection variables with standard Ansible connection variables:
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.5引入了两种顶级的持久连接类型， network_cli 和 netconf 。使用 connection: local ，每个任务都传递了连接参数，该参数必须存储在您的剧本中。剧本使用 network_cli 和 netconf 一次传递连接参数，因此您可以根据需要在命令行中传递它们。我们建议您尽可能使用 network_cli 和 netconf 。请注意，eAPI和NX-API仍需要使用 provider 字典进行 local 连接。有关更多信息，请参见平台文档。除非您需要 local 连接，请更新您的剧本以使用 network_cli 或 netconf 并使用标准Ansible连接变量指定连接变量：
